defitem.item: Web version of the finding aid funded in part by a grant from the National Endowment for the Humanities.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Wills family. Ledger, 1783-1795. Accession 24523a, Business records collection, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Virginia.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Lent for copying by Mrs. L.W. Turner, 30 August 1956.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: The ledger seems to have been kept by Henry Wills (1757-1833) and his son Robert C. Wills (b. 1792).

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The ledger entries (1783-1795) record sale of liquor, cloth and hardware items, charges for wintering cattle and the use of a plow team, as well as an estate sale. Entries relating to the Wills family include a will and vital statistics. See acc. 24523b for the Wills family Bible record.
